Application_Facts: No new evidence overcame prior credibility issues in PRRA application

Country conditions alone deemed insufficient to support risk claims

Defendant_Behavior: Officer failed to provide adequate reasons for H&C rejection

Governing_Rule: PRRA decisions reviewed on correctness; H&C on reasonableness
